name: Ailurophobia
description:
I feel kinda bad for calling this a "game" since it's just dialogue and clicking, but there are choices!!!

Anyways, this was a school project that I'm uploading only because some people showed interest in it. It's also my first-time using unity, so it's super rough and shitty, so be a little kind on me, please?

You "play" as Mewo, a non-binary little cat fella, and run errands for "Alex" in a town full of strange people. Hopefully nothing strange happens!

If you encounter any 'bugs' please detail which choices you made leading to that point and I'll see if I can fix it.

Also if anyone knows how to fix objects being placed incorrectly, please tell me!!!!!
